reviews.sentence: room smell bad carped dirty sofa bed dirty food is not good as it used to be.

Love this place. This place is magnificent. The hotel atrium is beautiful. Has running stream with fish. Lots of plants. They have a managers reception every weekday with free alcohol and good snacks. The pool and spa is inside which is nice during the winter. The rooms are all suites and very spacious with great amenities. I do not have a single complaint about this place.

Nice stay and convenient to stores dining. This was our second time and it was a nice stay. The suite was clean and nice. This time the hotel is undergoing a renovation to the lobby and they work on the weekends. It was a bit noisy. The breakfast had a nice selection. The staff is nice and friendly. The only complaint we have is about the little store on the site. It is not open during the day and when it is open there is not a lot of merchandise.

A little disappointed but staff made it right. Initially we were a little disappointed with our stay at this property. There was major construction remodeling going on beneath our room for the entirety of our stay. No one informed us of this upon our reservation or check in so we were surprised to discover the loud noise each morning. When I mentioned this to the front desk upon check out I was told a front desk supervisor would contact us. They did and she did make our stay right. However my biggest issue with the property is the lack of control each room has over heat or ac. This is all dictated by the hotel as it is an older property. I would not consider a return to this property until this has been updated. Each night is was very hot in our room and we had no way to adjust to a cooler temperature except for opening a window. This should be updated by corporate asap to compete in an area where there are a lot of hotel choices.

The facilities were very clean and modern. Loved it. Since I booked my room through Bokingcom using a credit card once I arrived I was not allowed to pay with cash. I was told I had to use the same credit card that I used to book the room. I did explain that I did not have the funds on the card and that I was willing to pay cash instead but that was not permissible. That was very disappointing and inconvenient for me.

Beware of Construction. This is one of the oldest ES properties and usually it does not show it is age. They are going through extensive construction to upgrade their common areas which is much needed but the noise level is deafening during the days. If you plan on just being in your room in the evening and leaving again in the morning you will never notice the noise. But if you have plans to remain at the hotel in the day time hours bring ear plugs.

Had two great stays. I was in the area on business for two weeks over the summer 2 separate stays and stayed at this Embassy. It was great. my room both times was super clean. Breakfast was fantastic nightly managers reception was great. Loved the bartenders during the week and the dinner I ordered from the restaurant was delicious. The staff was incredibly friendly and always eager to help with any questions. Walking distance to TONS of restaurants etc. I will be booking again when I return for business. great location that felt very safe especially given some of the other LA areas.

The 2Bedrom description was not only misleading but fraudulent as we booked for 2 couples only to find out that the other bedroom was the living room. The Front Desk staff started blaming Bokingcom saying that they are tricky. After negotiations they agreed to offer 1 night free a second room on the second night. But it turned out that they charged the card at full rate after check out. After a complain they acknowledged that the same Front Desk staff made the mistake of billing the guarantee credit card.

Had Higher Expectations. Under some kind of construction so it looked kind of beat up in some parts of the hotel. the room had a weird scent inside but was nice besides that. Was nt bad but for the price my expectation was higher.

Downey Embassy. I was pleased for the five days we stayed. The staff were friendly the enviornment was clean and well kept truly nothing to complain about. I would return if my plans take me to this area again.

Do not come here. This is not a place you want to stay. I read all the reviews it had and decided to stay here for a mini vacation near our home. Just to get out of the routine. Well this was a very unpleasant experience. Our first day here we checked in late do to the fact that we have a business and had to come late. When we arrived things were good until we get to our room. We realized they had giving us the wrong type of room. We booked a double suite in advanced and we are given a king. We are a family of five2 adults 3 children. We had to grabbed our tired children and walk back to the front desk. Spoke to Karla the front desk receptionist and boy was she rude. Looked confused so I showed her my phone with email prove I had booked a double suite. Got on her computer without apologizing and gave us new keys. When we walked in the new room there were two beds so we were happy. Until we saw the restroom. No tub yes no tub. This was a handicap room. Nothing wrong with it but I never requested a handicap room. We need a tub to take our kids baths. So we called front desk. Long story short she karla said she would call us back. Well we asked to speak to a supervisor. We spoke to him over the phone and was actually the manager in duty. Well Karla showed up giving us the new keys and finally apologizing but her words were. Well you guys checked in really late we are overboked and if you would have checked in earlier it would have been easier to get you guys a room. I said we booked early to avoid this issues. For my understanding when you book a room anywere you are in other words guaranteed you will have the room you noked. Apparently not here. Finally by like 930 we were able to get our room. Well just to say the rug was wet from were it appears to be the mini fridge leaking. Not good but decided to leave it that way and make the beat of our stay. Karla did try to fix things by giving our kids a bag of snacks and allowing them to pick a toy from a treasure box. Anyhow next day breakfast was great. Best service we had in the entire place were the servers. It ended there because after a long day by like 6 pm we got ready to go for a swim. Well so we thought. To find out pool was closed for maintenance ok a couple of hrs. No all day for cleaning. Wait we are leaving the next day and can not even get in the pool. We spoke to the front desk again Karla and another person but did nothing about it. Manager called to say we were going to complement the room for the night. Well that does not matter that is not the point. We kept hearing we understand you. No you do nt. Staying here for 400 for 2 nights for nothing. We did not enjoy our stay. We had to apologize to our crying kids for not being able to go in the pool. Disappointed in this place. Horrible place to stay. Not to mention the infestation of fruit mosquitos all over the walls outside by the elevators. Will not recommend this place to anyone.

Stay at an AirBnb. This is the worst hotel stay I have had in years. Terrible rooms terrible finishes terrible service food is over priced and an upgrade from a Burger King. An all around apathetic staff in fact I am not sure any of them know what Hospitality Management actually is.

I disagree with other peoples reviews. it is not old it is newly remodeled. From what I have seen the Staff are Courteous. The Food is Good. The Environment is Friendly and Clean. The Banquet Rooms the Restaurant the Lounge. the Bar everybody seems to be Happy. The Events and Private Parties are very well planned out an organized. it is a Family Oriented environment and all the Guests and their Children seem to be happy doing their Homework and enjoying the Pool and Sauna. I think it is nice place to stay and feel at home.

Excellent hotel. All the staff was great. Hotel was comfortable. I will be returning next visit to LA. Breakfast was hot and ready. It was also delicious with a great variety. I love the lighting on the rooms. Bed were comfortable.

I would n’t stay here again. To start off this hotel does n’t offer free WiFi. I know right. Who does n’t offer free WiFi when you ’ve paid over. a night but since most service providers have bad service in this hotel I guess that ’s how they want to rip you off. Secondly the rooms are small we got a suite for 4 people and that room would ’ve been comfortable for 2. The bathroom was outdated and tiny. The vent did n’t work well so we would shower with the door open. To top it off I had to sleep on the sofa bed and it was the ABSOLUTE WORST MATTRESS of life. Now I know you ’re thinking ‘ it ’s a sofa bed ’. but now a days every hotel I ’ve been to has better mattresses on their couch and they ’re actually not bad. This hotel however does n’t. As soon as you would sit on that thing you would be able to feel SPRING WIRES literally all over your body. It was probably the worst sleep of my entire life. I ’ve been to many hotels and this one took the number one spot in being the worst.
Would not recommend this hotel bad service. Staff were rude and they did nt go clean my room at all.
Underwent a massive remodel stayed a total of 10 nights. Would definitely recommend it for the service attention to detail and complimentary drinks every night. Food at the grill top notch.

Do not check in early. Do not check in early they charge you for checking in early while the busiest embassy suites in lax does not for checking in early. Besides that they are ok but managers special is a joke only nachos and salsa and veggies.

Very Pleasant One Night Visit. Enjoyed a one night visit. As an Hhonors Gold Member we were assigned the 8th floor top with a tiny balcony facing the rear of the hotel which afforded a distant view of downtown LA skyscrapers. Using the rear elevator seemed less busy than the front elevator. Room was nicely furnished with mini frig microwave table and chairs and very large TV in the living room. Cofemaker had low quality coffee using pods and one two cup tray design only one regular coffee and one decaf coffee pod were provided. King bed and second tv were in the bedroom. Pillows were quite flat but the spare pillow in the closet had more fluff. Air Conditioning system quiet and efficient tho only one thermostat for both rooms. Free WiFi for Hhonors Members free to join was fast in both romsBathrom very tiny with a shower no tub and individual toiletry bottles shampoo conditioner lotion. Location not near any freeways but plenty of businesses including restaurants very close by. Free parking and no resort fees led me to rate this property a 5 especially with friendly front desk staff and excellent housekeeping. Evening reception and morning breakfast seemed lower quality than I remember from past years. Only 2 basic beer choices for example with only a couple of munchies at evening reception made us leave early to get a real dinner. Breakfast had good made to order eggs but I have seen better complimentary breakfasts at Hyat Place HI Express and Hampton Inn.
Front desk was very rude at check it for no reason. No issues with the reservation so I ’m not sure why she was so rude. Everyone else was nice enough.

21th Birthday Stay Stayed At The Embassy Suites For My Son ’s 21th Birthday. He Had A Blast. Thank You All For Making It Happened. Our Cleaning Lady Maria Was Super Nice And Wonderful To Us. She Would Really Make Our Day. To All The Staff We Thank You Guys.

While the front desk receptionist was nice at checkin the hotel put us in a room directly under the elevator engine. COULD NOT SLEEP ALL NIGHT. It shook every time someone would use it. There was also a party door which also made it impossible to sleep. The noise did not stop till around 2 am. The walls are very thin. Do not stay in room 21. We were hoping to get a good night sleep after a long day of travels and chose this hotel because of their suites. After telling the receptionist in the morning we just got a discarded apology. It would have been a little better if the hotel would have warned us or know not to put their guests in that room. NEVER COMING BACK.

I did not like the customer service here. Staff including managers were very rude and distasteful regarding inconvenience of the customer. Will not recommend or reserve here again. Very disappointed for a Hilton experience.

Exceptional. Everything was great. Except one thing. The only down fall of this was that you had to pay for the wifi. I understand it ’s a very nice hotel but people pay a lot of money and they do n’t get wifi.

I did not like the customer service here. Staff including managers were very rude and distasteful regarding inconvenience of the customer. Will not recommend or reserve here again. Very disappointed for a Hilton experience.

Exceptional. Everything was great. Except one thing. The only down fall of this was that you had to pay for the wifi. I understand it ’s a very nice hotel but people pay a lot of money and they do n’t get wifi.

Exceptional. From check in to check out everything was smooth amazing. Great great amenities. I was a little sceptic because of the reviews but I ’m so glad i decided to just go for it. Will definitely be coming back.
